name: Featured Lists
description: Adds a button to your profile that opens a predetermined list

list_id.name: List ID
list_id.description: ID of the list you wish to be displayed on your profile

btn_texture.name: Button Texture
btn_texture.description:
Changes the texture of the "Featured List" button on your profile! 

 <co>0</c> = <cy>Default Texture</c> 
 <co>1</c> = <cy>Demon Texture</c> 
 <co>2</c> = <cy>Trophy Texture</c> 
 <co>3</c> = <cy>Creator Point Texture</c> 
 <co>4</c> = <cy>Star Texture</c>
